hero.title: Security Policy
hero.subtitle: Our commitment to protecting your data and documents

commitment.title: Security Commitment
commitment.content: DocumentoIQ takes data security seriously. We implement multiple layers of protection to safeguard your documents and information throughout the entire processing lifecycle.

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.content: All data transmission uses TLS 1.3 encryption. Documents at rest are encrypted using AES-256 encryption standards.

access.title: Access Controls
access.content: We implement strict access controls including multi-factor authentication (MFA), role-based access control (RBAC), and regular access audits.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Security
infrastructure.content: Our platform is hosted on enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure with: regular security updates, intrusion detection systems, DDoS protection, and automated backup systems.

monitoring.title: Security Monitoring
monitoring.content: We continuously monitor for security threats using automated tools and security incident response protocols. All security events are logged and reviewed regularly.

compliance.title: Compliance and Certifications
compliance.content: We adhere to industry-standard security frameworks and are working towards relevant certifications (ISO 27001, SOC 2, etc.).

items.processing: Documents are processed in isolated, secure environments
items.retention: Data retention policies ensure documents are deleted according to schedule
items.deletion: Secure deletion methods ensure data cannot be recovered after removal
items.access: Only authorized personnel can access user data, and all access is logged

items.password: Use strong, unique passwords for your account
items.sharing: Do not share your account credentials

incidents.title: Security Incident Response
incidents.content: In the event of a security incident:

items.detection: We will detect and assess the incident promptly
items.containment: Take immediate action to contain the threat
items.notification: Notify affected users as required by law
items.resolution: Resolve the issue and implement preventive measures

vulnerability.title: Vulnerability Disclosure
vulnerability.content: If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it responsibly to:
vulnerability.responsible: We encourage responsible disclosure and will work with security researchers to address issues promptly.

updates.title: Security Updates
updates.content: We regularly update our security measures and will communicate significant changes through our platform or via email to affected users.
